pagination.title: Pagination
pagination.you_are_on_last_page: You are on the last page

banner.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to personalize content and provide a better experience. You can choose to customize them by clicking the customize button.
banner.title: üç™ Hello. This website uses Cookies üç™

modal.title: Adjustment
modal.description: We use different types of cookies to optimize your experience on our website. Click on the categories below to learn more about their purpose. You can choose the types of Cookies that will be allowed as well as change your preferences later. Remember that banning cookies may affect your experience.

cookies.necessary_description: Necessary cookies help make a website easy to use by enabling basic functions such as page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. The website cannot function properly without these cookies.
cookies.analytics_description: By using this website, you consent to the collection, use and sharing of your data for analysis purposes. We may use cookies to collect and analyze information about your use of the website. This information helps us understand how users interact with the website and enables us to improve the user experience.
cookies.advertising_description: The website and our advertising partners (including social media platforms such as Google, Facebook and Instagram) use tracking to provide personalized offers aimed at giving you the full Webside experience. This includes sending "Targeted Messages on Third Party Advertising Platforms" as described in the Privacy Statement. If you do not accept this tracking, you will continue to see random Webside ads on other platforms.
cookies.functional_description: Functional cookies help to perform certain functions, such as sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collecting comments and other third-party functions.

cookie.iframe_blocked: To see this, enable functional cookies.

validation.too_many_attempts: Too many attempts, try again later.

card.share_not_supported: Web sharing is not supported in your browser
